text: Jhagadiya assembly constituency (ઝઘડીયા વિધાનસભા બેઠક) is one of the 182 assembly constituencies of Gujarat. It is located in Bharuch district. This seat is reserved for member of Scheduled Tribes. ==List of segments== This assembly seat represents the following segments, # Jhagadia Taluka # Valia Taluka #Netrang taluka ==Total Number of Voters== http://ceo.gujarat.gov.in/download/PCAC.pdf {| class="wikitable" |- ! Election !! Polling Stations !! Male Voters !! Female Voters !! Others !! Total Voters |- | 2014 || 301 || 113413 || 106107 || 3 || 219523 |} ==Member of Legislative Assembly== * 1962: Dhanuben Dalpatbhai Vasava, Indian National Congress * 1967: Zinabhai Ramsang Vasava, Indian National Congress * 1972: Chimanlal K Vasava, Indian National Congress * 1977: Zinabhai Ramsang Vasava, Indian National Congress * 1980: Ravadas Limjibha Vasava, Indian National Congress (I) * 1985: Ravadas Limjibha Vasava, Indian National Congress * 1990: Chhotubhai Vasava, Janata Dal * 1995: Chhotubhai Vasava, Janata Dal * 1998: Chhotubhai Vasava, Janata Dal * 2002: Chhotubhai Vasava, Janata Dal (United) * 2007: Chhotubhai Vasava, Janata Dal (United) * 2012: Chhotubhai Vasava, Janata Dal (United) *2017: Chhotubhai Vasava, Bharatiya Tribal Party ==Election results== ===2012=== http://ceo.gujarat.gov.in/download/Detail_Report_AC2012.pdf ==References== ==See also== List of constituencies of Gujarat Legislative Assembly Gujarat Legislative Assembly Category:Assembly constituencies of Gujarat Category:Bharuch district
title: Jhagadiya (Vidhan Sabha constituency)
